patthana15.86:1.1_0: Saraṇo anuppanno dhammo nasaraṇassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:1.1_1: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye cattāri.
patthana15.86:2.1_0: Araṇo uppādī dhammo naaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:2.1_1: Araṇo uppādī dhammo nasaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:2.1_2: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, upanissaye dve.
